parameters.name: AccountName
parameters.description: The sender address. If you leave this parameter empty, data for all sender addresses is returned.

parameters.name: DedicatedIp
parameters.description:
The dedicated IP address. This parameter is available only for users of dedicated IPs.

If you leave this parameter empty, data for all dedicated IPs is returned.

parameters.name: DedicatedIpPoolId
parameters.description:
The ID of the dedicated IP pool. This parameter is available only for users of dedicated IPs.

If you leave this parameter empty, data for all IP pools is returned.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end time. The time span between the start time and the end time cannot exceed 7 days. The format is yyyy-MM-dd.

parameters.name: Esp
parameters.description:
The Email Service Provider (ESP). This parameter is available only for users of dedicated IPs. You can set this parameter to one of the following values:

- gmail.com

- yahoo.com

- outlook.com

- icloud.com

- others (Data for ESPs other than the ones listed above)

If you leave this parameter empty, data for all ESPs is returned.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time. The time cannot be earlier than 30 days ago. The format is yyyy-MM-dd.

parameters.name: TagName
parameters.description: The email tag. If you leave this parameter empty, data for all tags is returned.
